title: I can’t sit still for 30 seconds without thinking of something. Why? - Quora

response.answer_text: The same reason you can’t stop hearing for 30 seconds, smelling for 30 seconds, or turn off any senses with your mind. There seems to be a cultural understanding that humans are in control of their thoughts, but that’s not the case. The brain is in control. Thoughts just bubble up. Sometimes we focus on them, sometimes they are in the background. Our brain controls the show, and consciousness is a very small sliver of this activity. Most of the work (and all the really complicated work) our brain/body does happens unconsciously.
